item.description:

Chinese leader Xi Jinping visited the Philippines on Tuesday to further strategic gains made under President Rodrigo Duterte, who hailed a "new impetus" behind a relationship that his massive infrastructure ambitions could depend on. item.description:

item.description:
China and Philippines sign offshore oil and gas deal  Financial Times

item.description:

item.description:

MANILA — A Philippine court on Friday sentenced Imelda R.
